units.name: Abomination
units.description: This Tanky mass of flesh and steel will Hook ranged enemies, drawing them into his Cleave attack.

talents.name: Noxius Presence
talents.description: Poison nearby enemies every 3 seconds.

talents.name: Cannonball
talents.description: On deploy and at 50 % health, stun nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Fresh Meat
talents.description: After hooking a target, deal double damage on the next attack.

units.name: Angry Chickens
units.description: A flock of feathered fowl that can overwhelm even the heartiest of Tanks and Towers.

talents.name: Snackrifice
talents.description: Nearby Beast allies can consume a Chicken to heal themselves.

talents.name: Walking Crate
talents.description: Deploy in a protective crate. When destroyed, Chickens emerge.

talents.name: Furious Fowl
talents.description: Gain Fury.

units.name: Arcane Blast
units.description: This spell surges with power! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and doubles the Elemental damage!

talents.name: Amplification
talents.description: Sequential taps increase radius by 1.

talents.name: Arcane Power
talents.description: Spell sequence starts at rank 3 and ends at rank 4.

talents.name: Torrent
talents.description: Gain a level after casting Rank 4.

units.name: Banshee
units.description: Shrieks in delight at nearby enemies, Possessing the first she sees to fight for you, permanently.

talents.name: Soul Eruption
talents.description: Possessed targets detonate on death, damaging nearby enemies.

talents.name: Unholy Frenzy
talents.description: Possessed targets gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Will of the Necropolis
talents.description: Fully Heal the possessed target.

units.name: Baron Rivendare
units.description: Bane of the Scarlet Crusade.

talents.name: Death Pact
talents.description: Periodically sacrifice a nearby Skeleton to be Healed.

talents.name: Skeletal Frenzy
talents.description: Nearby allied Skeletons gain Bloodlust.

talents.name: Chill Of The Grave
talents.description: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Warriors.

units.name: Bat Rider
units.description: A cheap aerial unit that specializes in bathing the ground in flame while Flying above Melee enemies.

talents.name: Flaming Pitch
talents.description: Flaming pool reduces enemy's speed by 30%.

talents.name: Enchanted Vials
talents.description: Increase the size of the flaming pool by 30%.

talents.name: Fiery Surplus
talents.description: "Accidentally" leave vials on the ground, Burning nearby enemies that touch them.

units.name: Blizzard
units.description: Rain down Frost shards from the sky! Slows and deals Elemental damage to all enemies in a large area.

talents.name: Cold Snap
talents.description: Freeze enemy troops in place.

talents.name: Brittle Ice
talents.description: Enemies within take 30% additional damage from Physical sources.

talents.name: Icecrown
talents.description: Summons an additional Blizzard at your Base.

units.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
units.description: Blood magic is thicker than water magic.

talents.name: Drain Life
talents.description: Gain Lifesteal.

talents.name: Bane
talents.description: Playing a spell increases attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Dominance
talents.description: Spells costing 4 or more grant an additional level.

units.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
units.description: The original Elite Tauren Chieftain.

talents.name: Reincarnation
talents.description: After death, Resurrect at 50% Health once.

talents.name: Plainsrunning
talents.description: Move 50% faster and gain the Fast trait.

talents.name: Aftershock
talents.description: When Stun expires, affected enemies are Dazed for 5 seconds.

units.name: Chain Lightning
units.description: Swarmed by Squads of smaller foes? Send a surge of lightning sizzling through several enemies!

talents.name: Brilliant Flash
talents.description: On deploy, Stun enemies within for 1 second.

talents.name: Reverberation
talents.description: Can be cast a second time.

talents.name: Storm's Reach
talents.description: Dramatically increase jump distance between targets.

units.name: Charlga Razorflank
units.description: Your Minis in hand share the same cost. What???

talents.name: Spirit Passage
talents.description: Minis played for 5 Gold gain a level and deploy in Stealth.

talents.name: Cavernous Mists
talents.description: Deploy cost reduced by 1.

talents.name: Nature's Grasp
talents.description: Root two additional nearby targets, but deal half damage.

units.name: Cheat Death
units.description: Imbue your minions with one last breath of death, preventing them from dying for a precious few seconds.

talents.name: Vampirism
talents.description: Affected minis are Healed when dealing damage.

talents.name: Apocalypse
talents.description: Affected Skeletons Resurrect at your base when they die.

talents.name: Seal Fate
talents.description: Affected minis gain Bloodlust, but die when the effect ends.

units.name: Core Hounds
units.description: This pair of Resistant Tanks is only dead when both are snuffed out. When one falls, the other rekindles it!

talents.name: Eternal Bond
talents.description: Resurrection range is unlimited.

talents.name: Guard Dog
talents.description: Deal 50% additional damage near friendly towers and meeting stones.

talents.name: Fiery Rebirth
talents.description: On Resurrection, damage nearby enemies.

units.name: Dark Iron Miner
units.description: When there's more Gold than your Kobold can mine, hire another to mine behind enemy lines!

talents.name: Gold Mine
talents.description: After Mining, drop a proximity mine. Damages nearby enemies when touched.

talents.name: Dark Iron Armaments
talents.description: After Mining, gain Armored.

talents.name: Dwarven Ambition
talents.description: Gain Fury.

units.name: Darkspear Troll
units.description: This headhunter deals massive damage with savage spear throws. Enemies in the air beware!

talents.name: Big Bad Voodoo
talents.description: Regenerate 20% health every second.

talents.name: Headhunting
talents.description: On kill, increase Attack and Movement speed by 10%. Stacks to 50%.

talents.name: Serpent Sting
talents.description: Gain Poison.

units.name: Deep Breath
units.description: Strike with dragon's breath in any direction, dealing Elemental damage to enemies in the line of fire!

talents.name: Attunement
talents.description: Allies caught in the effect gain Resist.

talents.name: Melting Point
talents.description: Damaging Armored enemies removes their Armor.

talents.name: Double Dragon
talents.description: Cast a second wave in the opposite direction.

units.name: Defias Bandits
units.description: Stealthy and weak on their own, but will sneak up and Stun enemies while your damage dealers open fire!

talents.name: Pick Lock
talents.description: Earn an extra +2 Gold when opening chests.

talents.name: Deadly Poison
talents.description: Gain Poison.

talents.name: Last Resort
talents.description: On death, Stun the target for 3 seconds.

units.name: Drake
units.description: Flies over the battlefield with flaming breath, incinerating Flying and Ground enemies alike.

talents.name: Mother Drake
talents.description: Periodically summon a Whelp Egg.

talents.name: Engulfing Flames
talents.description: Damaging enemies Burns them.

talents.name: Roost
talents.description: Perch on top of a nearby tower, staying there to defend it.

units.name: Earth Elemental
units.description: Drop this heavily Armored avalanche anywhere to Tank for your troops. Only punches Towers and Bosses.

talents.name: Obsidian Shard
talents.description: On death, split into two smaller Earth Elementals.

talents.name: Ready to Rumble
talents.description: Taunt on deploy.

talents.name: Shrapnel Blast
talents.description: Destroying a tower deals damage to nearby enemies.

units.name: Execute
units.description: Savagely slice through enemies, chopping off half of their maximum Health in one swipe.

talents.name: Bloodthirsty
talents.description: Bloodlust allies within spell area for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Overpower
talents.description: Knock enemies away from the cast location.

talents.name: Killing Spree
talents.description: If an enemy is killed, the next Horde mini costs 1 less.

units.name: Fire Elemental
units.description: Resistant to Elemental damage. Specializes in Cleaving through Armored enemies.

talents.name: Immolation Aura
talents.description: Periodically damage nearby enemies.

talents.name: Molten Core
talents.description: On death, summon a pool of lava, damaging enemies within.

talents.name: Fan The Flames
talents.description: Taking Elemental damage increases damage dealt by 10%. Stacks to 30%.

units.name: Firehammer
units.description: Furiously flings fiery hammers at foes. Starts slow, but her Armor melting momentum can't be matched.

talents.name: Moultin' Metal
talents.description: Deal 50% more damage to Flying enemies.

talents.name: Blazing Speed
talents.description: Fury builds up to 40% higher.

talents.name: Heightened Rage
talents.description: Level up upon reaching full Fury.

units.name: Flamewaker
units.description: Ignites the ground with waves of flame, incinerating supporting troops behind enemy Tanks.

talents.name: Backdraft
talents.description: Successive attacks increase flame wave distance. Resets on movement.

talents.name: Engulf
talents.description: Damaging enemies Burns thems.

talents.name: Heat Stroke
talents.description: Damaging enemies Dazes them.

units.name: Footmen
units.description: An Armored phalanx Squad of steel, a great Tank for fragile allies, and can be split to defend two lanes at once!

talents.name: Fortification
talents.description: Gain 30% extra empty Health.

talents.name: Shield Bash
talents.description: Periodically Stun the target for 1 second.

talents.name: Last Stand
talents.description: Armor increases to 75% damage reduction when no other Footmen are nearby.

units.name: Frostwolf Shaman
units.description: Why choose between Ranged damage and Healing when you can have both? Elemental mastery to heal and harm!

talents.name: Earth Shield
talents.description: Grant Armored to a nearby ally. Ability has 1 charge.

talents.name: Lightning Mastery
talents.description: Ranged attack chains to 3 nearby targets.

talents.name: Earthwall Totem
talents.description: Once per deploy, place a totem that partially heals a nearby tower or base.

units.name: Gargoyle
units.description: A Flying fortress of Armor. This single-minded Tank attacks buildings and bosses, ignoring all other distractions.

talents.name: Wing Buffet
talents.description: ncreases move speed by 33%.

talents.name: Aerial Superiority
talents.description: Incoming damage from Flying minis is reduced by 50%.

talents.name: Obsidian Statue
talents.description: On death, summon a statue with Taunt. Lasts until destroyed.

units.name: General Drakkisath
units.description: A cunning and ruthless strategist.

talents.name: Chromatic Scales
talents.description: Grants nearby allies the Resistant trait.

talents.name: Piercing Blows
talents.description: Attacks pierce through enemies in a line.

talents.name: Lasting Legacy
talents.description: On death, drop a banner. Nearby enemies take 50% additional Elemental damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

units.name: Ghoul
units.description: A cheap but ravenous Tank, ready to feast on fallen enemies to replenish its Health.

talents.name: Bone Shield
talents.description: Cannibalizing grants Armored for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Taste for Blood
talents.description: Deal 50% additional damage to enemies who are below 50% health.

talents.name: Ravenous
talents.description: Cannibalizing grants Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

units.name: Gnoll Brute
units.description: A tough Tank with a menacing mace. Cleaves through Squads of enemies, or clobbers with collateral damage.

talents.name: Rabid
talents.description: Reduce deploy cost by 1 and gain the Cycle trait.

talents.name: Pillage
talents.description: Deal Siege damage.

talents.name: Thick Hide
talents.description: Gain Armor.

units.name: Goblin Sapper
units.description: Sappers sacrifice themselves to deliver superior Siege damage in seconds. Topple Towers with this tag team!

talents.name: Rocket Powered Turbo Boots
talents.description: Move twice as fast and gain the Fast trait.

talents.name: Extra BOOM
talents.description: Deploy an additional +1 Goblin Sapper.

talents.name: Crude Gunpowder
talents.description: On death, Burn nearby enemies.

units.name: Grommash Hellscream
units.description: Don't call me Grom!

talents.name: Bladestorm
talents.description: Gain an AOE bladespin ability that damages all nearby enemies.

talents.name: Savage Strikes
talents.description: Deal double damage to enemies who are below 50% health.

talents.name: Mirror Image
talents.description: Summon two fragile mirror images when entering combat.

units.name: Gryphon Rider
units.description: A sky-riding Flier that throws mighty dwarven hammers at aerial and ground troops alike.

talents.name: Mighty Throw
talents.description: Gain +3 Range.

talents.name: Odyn's Fury
talents.description: Gain Fury.

talents.name: Air Drop
talents.description: Periodically drop a potion, leveling up the first ally to touch it.

units.name: Harpies
units.description: A trio of fragile Fliers, but if they can reach their target, they will shred it in seconds.

talents.name: Infectious Swipes
talents.description: Gain Poison.

talents.name: Trinket Collectors
talents.description: Gain the Miner trait. Cost increased by 1.

talents.name: Talon Dive
talents.description: Deal double damage on the 1st attack.

units.name: Harvest Golem
units.description: A hearty Melee automaton with a trick up its sleeve - After its first death it will shock itself back to life!

talents.name: Trojan Chickens
talents.description: On death, spawn 4 Angry Chickens.

talents.name: Unstable Core
talents.description: On death, Stun nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Bountiful Harvest
talents.description: On death, apply a Heal over time effect to nearby allies.

units.name: Hogger
units.description: The legendary terror of Elwynn Forest. Mercilessly CLEAVES aspiring adventurers and rallies Gnoll Brutes to his cause.

talents.name: Ham Hock
talents.description: Hogger also gains +10% max health each time he is played.

talents.name: Spoiled Meat
talents.description: Gain Poison.

talents.name: Fatal Frenzy
talents.description: On death, Bloodlust nearby Beasts.

units.name: Holy Nova
units.description: Bathe friend and foe in holy light, Healing allies and damaging enemies to turn the tide of battle!

talents.name: Inner Fire
talents.description: Affected allies gain Armored and Resist for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Amplify Magic
talents.description: Effects are doubled on all Elemental minis.

talents.name: Renew
talents.description: Also adds a heal over time to allies.

units.name: Huntress
units.description: A Fast and lethal Ranged rider. Her glaives slice through Squads, bouncing from foe to foe.

talents.name: Elven Might
talents.description: Deal 50% additional damage to the initial target.

talents.name: Shadowmeld
talents.description: Gain Stealth and Ambush.

talents.name: Darnassian Steel
talents.description: Glaive bounces an additional 3 times.

units.name: Jaina Proudmoore
units.description: Jaina makes her own bling.

talents.name: Clearcasting
talents.description: Spells cost 1 less (but no less than 1) if played immediately after Jaina.

talents.name: Flurry
talents.description: Frostbolts burst on impact, Frosting enemies near the target.

talents.name: Blink
talents.description: Periodically teleport away from attackers.

units.name: Living Bomb
units.description: Plant a bomb on a group of enemies that all blow up for excessive collateral damage. The more the flamier!

talents.name: Chain Reaction
talents.description: Splash damage inflicts Living Bomb.

talents.name: Blast Radius
talents.description: Also burn enemies within 10 units.

talents.name: Burden Of Fate
talents.description: Affected enemies are Dazed.

units.name: Maiev Shadowsong
units.description: Wield the shadows and strike like the wind.

talents.name: Remorseless
talents.description: Deal double damage for 2 seconds after killing an enemy.

talents.name: Enveloping Shadows
talents.description: Cast Smoke Bomb on deploy, Stealthing nearby allies.

talents.name: Shadowstep
talents.description: eriodically teleport to a ranged attacker when hit.

units.name: Meat Wagon
units.description: Sieges enemies with slabs of meat. Bombards from so far away that it outranges Towers!

talents.name: Filet Trebuchet
talents.description: Increase Bombard range by +2.

talents.name: Meat And Bones
talents.description: Every other attack summons a Skeleton instead of dealing damage.

talents.name: Greased Gears
talents.description: Gain Fury.

units.name: Molten Giant
units.description: A wall of Armored obsidian. Slow and lumbering but devastating to Towers. The ultimate Melee Tank.

talents.name: Bolster
talents.description: Heal when destroying a tower.

talents.name: Threatening Presence
talents.description: Gain Taunt.

talents.name: Blood Of The Mountain
talents.description: On death, explode, damaging nearby enemies.

units.name: Mountaineer
units.description: This inseparable Tank and Ranged pair cover each other for an instantly effective offensive!

talents.name: Mend Pets
talents.description: Heal up to 3 additional nearby Beasts when healing the Bear.

talents.name: Intimidation
talents.description: Bear gains Taunt.

talents.name: Frenzied Spirit
talents.description: When the Bear or Mountaineer die, the other gains Bloodlust.

units.name: Murloc Tidehunters
units.description: Fast and cheap, great for supporting Tanks and taking Treasure Chests, but weak on their own.

talents.name: Safety Bubble
talents.description: Deploy with a bubble that blocks the first attack.

talents.name: Morelocs
talents.description: Deploy with +1 additional Murloc.

talents.name: Careful Aim
talents.description: Gain +2 range.

units.name: Necromancer
units.description: Endlessly summons Skeletons for protection while piercing through Armor with Elemental shadow bolts.

talents.name: Jeweled Skulls
talents.description: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Skeletons.

talents.name: Cult of the Damned
talents.description: On kill, summon a Skeleton.

talents.name: Breath of the Dying
talents.description: On death, summon 5 Skeletons.

units.name: Ogre Mage
units.description: Hurling fireballs is always brutal, but this Magi also buffs nearby allies with Bloodlust. More bang for your buck!

talents.name: Avarice
talents.description: Gain Bloodlust when Bloodlusting an ally.

talents.name: Frostfire Bolt
talents.description: Gain Frost.

talents.name: Ignite
talents.description: Burn enemy targets.

units.name: Old Murk-Eye
units.description: This seasoned Murloc has (and hasn't) seen plenty of battles. If you can shell out the Gold, his entourage of Tidehunters is shore to make waves on the battlefield.

talents.name: Marathon Of The Murlocs
talents.description: March of the Murlocs lasts an additional 5 seconds longer after deploying.

talents.name: Electric Eels
talents.description: Attacks briefly Stun enemies.

talents.name: Tip of the Spear
talents.description: Tidehunters spawn at Old Murk Eye's location instead.

units.name: Plague Farmer
units.description: Bombards enemy ground troops with Poisonous pumpkins. Keep him alive and watch enemies rot!

talents.name: Splashing Pumpkins
talents.description: Increase Range by +1 and double the Splash area.

talents.name: Parting Gift
talents.description: On death, summon a pumpkin. When touched, it Poisons nearby enemies.

talents.name: Virulence
talents.description: On kill, Poison enemies near the target.

units.name: Polymorph
units.description: Morphs your foes into fluffy yet feeble sheep, stripping them of their defenses and making them Vulnerable for a precious few seconds!

talents.name: Golden Fleece
talents.description: One sheep becomes golden. Killing it grants +1 gold.

talents.name: Exploding Sheep
talents.description: Killing a sheep damages nearby enemies.

talents.name: Stable Transfiguration
talents.description: Lasts twice as long, but sheep regenerate health very quickly.

units.name: Prowler
units.description: A Fast and ferocious Melee Tank. Sprints ahead to protect slower troops, or defend a far away fight.

talents.name: On The Prowl
talents.description: Gain Stealth, and stun the target when attacking from Stealth.

talents.name: Pack Leader
talents.description: Grants nearby Beast allies 30% additional damage.

talents.name: Predatory Instincts
talents.description: Deal double damage to enemies who are at more than 75% health.

units.name: Pyromancer
units.description: Sometimes you need to light an enemy on fire. She prefers to light them all on fire.

talents.name: Conflagrate
talents.description: Splash area is doubled.

talents.name: Pyroblast
talents.description: Deal triple damage on the first attack.

talents.name: Blaze of Glory
talents.description: Damage and Burn nearby enemies on death.

units.name: Quilboar
units.description: Surprise your enemies with this Unbound Melee burrower! Slow to emerge but bristling for a fight.

talents.name: Tunnel Vision
talents.description: Deploy much more quickly.

talents.name: Bristleback
talents.description: Deal a small amount of damage to Melee attackers.

talents.name: Bramble Burst
talents.description: Inflict Poison on nearby enemies when emerging.

units.name: Raptors
units.description: Fast savage slashers! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and deploys an additional Raptor.

talents.name: Strength In Numbers
talents.description: Deal 10% more damage for each other Raptor nearby.

talents.name: Fast Food
talents.description: On kill, heal a small amount of damage.

talents.name: Motivation
talents.description: Gain Bloodlust while a chest or gold vein is nearby.

units.name: Rend Blackhand
units.description: Riding dragons before it was coool.

talents.name: Scale and Steel
talents.description: Gain Resistant while flying and Armored while dismounted.

talents.name: Flaming Soul
talents.description: Cast Living Bomb upon dismounting, damaging nearby enemies.

talents.name: Legionnaire
talents.description: Dismount when first taking damage. The Drake continues fighting.

units.name: S.A.F.E. Pilot
units.description: A flexible Ranged unit. Crash her into enemies or land her behind your Tanks for Area Damage support.

talents.name: Gnomish Cloaking Device
talents.description: Deploy from the explosion with Stealth and Ambush.

talents.name: Comin' In Hot!
talents.description: Deploy twice as fast and Burn nearby enemies.

talents.name: Gnomish Muttonizer
talents.description: Polymorph the first blaster target.

units.name: Skeleton Party
units.description: A Frosty surprise for any location! Raise a Squad of Ranged and Melee Skeletons to assist with any skirmish.

talents.name: 5-Man
talents.description: Summons a Skeleton Tank, Rogue, Priest, and 2 Mages.

talents.name: Corpse Run
talents.description: Gain +1 level for each deploy after the first. (Maximum +3 levels)

talents.name: Ritual of Rime
talents.description: Summon 5 Skeleton Mages who guard the deploy location.

units.name: Skeletons
units.description: These Skeletons can arise anywhere on the map to distract enemies or claim a remote resource.

talents.name: Questing Buddies
talents.description: One Skeleton gains Armor, one gains Resist, and one gains Stealth.

talents.name: Exhume
talents.description: If deployed near a Tower or Meeting Stone, deploy +2 additional Skeletons.

talents.name: Cackle
talents.description: Gain Taunt.

units.name: Smoke Bomb
units.description: Get the drop on your enemies by granting Stealth to nearby allies. Use in a skirmish to confuse the enemy!

talents.name: Through The Shadows
talents.description: Affected minis move 50% faster until unstealthed.

talents.name: Band Of Thieves
talents.description: Grant +2 levels to Cycle minis within.

talents.name: Strangers in the Night
talents.description: Effects apply to enemies as well.

units.name: Sneed
units.description: When you are a buzzsaw, all your problems look like trees.

talents.name: Lead With Greed
talents.description: Gain an additional +2 Gold when Sneed triggers Sneed Before Greed.

talents.name: Mine Is Money, Friend!
talents.description: Gain the Miner trait.

talents.name: Land Grab
talents.description: Gain a level whenever Sneed Before Greed.

units.name: Spiderlings
units.description: A Squad of Poisonous predators. Their venom will pierce Armor and down even the mightiest of Tanks.

talents.name: Frostbite
talents.description: Gain Frost.

talents.name: Bloated Carapace
talents.description: Explode on death, Poisoning nearby enemies.

talents.name: Envenom
talents.description: Deal twice as much Poison damage.

units.name: Stonehoof Tauren
units.description: An exceptionally beefy bruiser that will Charge into battle, and even Charge while she's in battle!

talents.name: Momentum
talents.description: After connecting a charge, immediately charge a second time if possible.

talents.name: Pummel
talents.description: After connecting a charge, Stun the target for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Provoke
talents.description: After connecting a charge, Taunt nearby enemies.

units.name: Sylvannas Windrunner
units.description: Sylvanas attacks with unrelenting arrow shots, and releases a Banshee when she dies.

talents.name: Black Arrow
talents.description: Pierce through enemies in a line, dealing Elemental damage.

talents.name: Banshee's Wail
talents.description: Scream on Death, Stunning nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Forsaken Fury
talents.description: Nearby Horde and Undead Minis gain Fury.

units.name: Tirion Fordring
units.description: A hammer of CLEAVING , a hand of HEALING , and ARMOR of believing. What more do you need?

talents.name: Divine Shield
talents.description: Gain a magical shield at 30% health, absorbing all damage for 5 seconds.

talents.name: By The Light
talents.description: Heal the primary target for twice as much.

talents.name: Consecrate
talents.description: Regularly consecrate the ground, damaging enemies within.

units.name: Vultures
units.description: A cheap pair of Flying scavengers. Two vultures are a nuisance, but each vulture victim adds to the flock!

talents.name: Feeding Frenzy
talents.description: The flock gains Bloodlust for 5 seconds when spawning a new Vulture.

talents.name: Migration
talents.description: All additional Vultures spawn at your base.

talents.name: Tendon Rip
talents.description: Attacks Daze enemies for 3 seconds.

units.name: Warsong Grunts
units.description: While slow and steady at the start, this Squad of fighters will speed up, Furiously slashing at frightened foes.

talents.name: Command
talents.description: Nearby Beast allies deal 30% additional damage.

talents.name: Blood Pact
talents.description: When a Grunt dies, the other gain Bloodlust.

talents.name: Guard Duty
talents.description: Remain at deploy location until entering combat.

units.name: Warsong Raider
units.description: This Fast rider smashes Towers with savage sustained Siege damage. Clear a path and she'll clear the rest.

talents.name: Razing Focus
talents.description: Become a Siege unit, ignoring enemy Minis.

talents.name: Sunder Armor
talents.description: Damaging an Armored enemy removes their Armor.

talents.name: Saboteur
talents.description: Damaging a tower reduces its damage dealt by 50% for 3 seconds.

units.name: Whelp Eggs
units.description: Drop these eggs anywhere on the battlefield to surprise Melee enemies with many fiery Flying whelps!

talents.name: Flame Burst
talents.description: Damage nearby enemies when hatching.

talents.name: Rookery
talents.description: When one egg hatches, the others hatch immediately.

talents.name: Chromatic Plating
talents.description: Eggs gain Taunt.

units.name: Worgen
units.description: This Stealthy predator assassinates annoying Ranged units. Play him anywhere and tear their support apart!

talents.name: Premeditation
talents.description: Increase Ambush damage by 50%.

talents.name: Lone Wolf
talents.description: On deploy, grant +1 gold if no allies are nearby.

talents.name: Frenzy
talents.description: On kill, gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

units.name: Chimaera
units.description: A Flying malefic monstrosity that rains down Poison and Lightning on multiple miniscule minions.

talents.name: Leviathan
talents.description: Gain 10% additional Health per deploy.

talents.name: Frost Shock
talents.description: Lightning Ball applies Frost on hit.

talents.name: Fiery Rebirth
talents.description: Poison Spit inflicts twice as much Poison.

units.name: Emperor Thaurissan
units.description: If Ragnaros was your boss, you'd be cranky too.

talents.name: Moira's Wit
talents.description: Nearby Burning enemies Heal Thaurissan.

talents.name: Hubris
talents.description: After playing Thaurissan, your next non-Elemental Mini deploys with +2 levels.

talents.name: Incinerate
talents.description: Lava Spike's Burn is permanent.

units.name: Witch Doctor
units.description: A Cycle support caster. Channels an explosive Curse on an enemy, helping allies take out multiple foes!

talents.name: Alchemist
talents.description: Periodically drop a potion, granting Bloodlust to the first ally who touches it.

talents.name: Amplify Curse
talents.description: Enemies killed by the Curse explosion also explode.

talents.name: Spirit Ward
talents.description: On kill, grant a shield to nearby allies, absorbing the next hit against them.

units.name: Faerie Dragon
units.description: This flying trickster can see through Stealth, and shakes off Poison, Burn, Stuns, and Slows!

talents.name: Phase Shift
talents.description: Teleport backwards when attacked.

talents.name: Invisibility
talents.description: Gain Stealth.

talents.name: Fae Blessing
talents.description: Once per deploy, grant Resist to a nearby Ally.

question_templates.type_1: Which mini can learn the talent '{talent_name}'?
question_templates.type_3: Which faction does the mini '{unit_name}' belong to?
question_templates.type_4: How much gold does it cost to play the mini '{unit_name}'?
